com.github.deltarobotics9351.deltadrive.drive.mecanum

Class JoystickDriveMecanum

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.deltarobotics9351.deltadrive.drive.mecanum.JoystickDriveMecanum

  • public class JoystickDriveMecanum
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to control a mecanum chassis during teleop using a gamepad's joysticks.

    • Method Detail

      • joystick

        public void joystick(com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.Gamepad gamepad,
                     double turbo)
        Control a mecanum chassis using a gamepad's joysticks. Use left stick to go forward, backwards and strafe, and right stick to turn This method should be called always in the teleop loop to update the motor powers
        Parameters:
        gamepad - the gamepad used to control the chassis.
        turbo - the chassis max speed, from 0 to 1
